title: Student on a scale in an elevator

content.question: A student of mass <math alttext="uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is standing on a scale plate placed on the floor of an elevator. When the elevator is not moving, the reading <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>N</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the scale is <math alttext="N equals, uppercase M times g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. At some later time, the elevator is moving upward with speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and slowing down with an acceleration of magnitude <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Based on these data, which of the following statements about <math alttext="N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>N</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> must be correct?

choices.label: <math alttext="N equals, lowercase m times, open parenthesis, g plus v, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>v</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="N equals, lowercase m times g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="N equals, lowercase m times, open parenthesis, g minus v, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>v</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="N equals, lowercase m times, open parenthesis, g plus a, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="N equals, lowercase m times, open parenthesis, g minus a, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="N equals, lowercase m times, open parenthesis, g minus a, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
